### Compliance Flags

### Events
- WQ-01 datalogger firmware updated to v3.2.1
- Osprey nest activity near WQ-02, no restrictions
- Flow gauge WQ-06 recalibrated after drift check

### Notes
- Day 22 monitoring. Cr spatial gradient: WQ-01(4), WQ-02(5), WQ-03(60), WQ-04(38.8), WQ-05(24.7), WQ-06(16.0). Compliance review in progress.
